name: tamanu
description: This repo contains all the packages for Tamanu
author: Beyond Essential Systems Pty. Ltd.

scripts.web-unit-test: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/web-frontend test
scripts.web-unit-test-watch: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/web-frontend test-watch
scripts.facility-test: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/facility-server test
scripts.facility-start-dev: npm run build-shared && npm run watch-shared-and @tamanu/facility-server start-dev
scripts.facility-migrate: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/facility-server start-watch migrate
scripts.facility-migrate-down: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/facility-server start-watch migrate down
scripts.mobile-run-android: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/mobile android
scripts.shared-test: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/shared test
scripts.central-test: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/central-server test
scripts.central-shell: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/central-server shell
scripts.central-start-dev: npm run build-shared && npm run watch-shared-and @tamanu/central-server start-dev
scripts.central-migrate: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/central-server start-watch migrate
scripts.central-migrate-down: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/central-server start-watch migrate down
scripts.build-report: npm run build-shared && npm run --workspace @tamanu/central-server build && npm run --workspace @tamanu/central-server start report
